=== Ubuntu Forums ===

* These are our public forums. Preferred forums are at http://sdloco.profarius.com/forum. Faster responses are likely here.

==== Admins ====

These members are administrators in the SD LoCo Ubuntu Forums.

==== Monitors ====

These members are in charge of keeping in touch with the Ubuntu Forums to watch for new topics. If necessary, they should post a message to the mailing list notifying members of this post. These members are expected to check the forums daily in order to keep response time low.
